transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi sir, good morning.
Customer: Hi, good morning.
Executive: Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, baat ho sakti hai abhi?
Customer: Haan ji, kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Main Shruti baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Achha, haan Shruti, hi. Nehal baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan Nehal sir, actually kal na mere paas call aa raha tha aapki taraf se. Primary number pe I guess Harshad sir available hai kya?
Customer: Haan, haan, Harshad bhai ka phone aaya hoga aap se. Haan, Harshad bhai se baat hui thi na us din aapki?
Executive: Ek baar unka matlab mere paas bahut baar call aaya. Kuch issues face kar rahe hain. Abhi maine unko call lagayi thi but unka number not reachable tha to maine ek bari aapko kara hai. Kya exactly issues sir aa rahe hain aap? Matlab kya service mein dikkat aa rahi hai? Wo baar baar matlab itna zyada ek to wo baat bhi nahi sun rahe hain, apna hi matlab bol ke wo phone disconnect kar de rahe hain. Main unse connect hi nahi kar pa rahi hu.
Customer: To exactly issues kya hai sir ki matlab itna zyada wo ho raha hai ki...
Executive: I don't know ma'am, mujhe bhi pata nahi actually. Wo kal to hum the saath mein lekin shaam ko the.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Lekin pata nahi usko ek problem tha jo aap se discuss kiya tha parso ki catalog ke andar jo bhi matlab pure jo bhi size hai wo sab available karna hai.
Executive: Jo bhi?
Customer: Matlab jitne bhi size the na aapko wo PDF bheja tha pata hai aapko?
Executive: Haan, uske liye sir aapko...
Customer: Usko onboard karna tha.
Executive: Usko sir aapko mujhe photos bhejna padega kyunki wo utne sare photos ek saath aise add nahi ho sakte hain. To aapko uske liye mujhe pehla to hum log ko time lena padega kyunki aapka catalog production mein jayega aur uske aapko mujhe photos provide karna padega. Wo code se hum log nahi kar sakte hain. Aapko mujhe ek ek photo dena padega and uske saath uska naam aur specification aapko mujhe provide karna padega so that main usko phir add kar paun.
Customer: Ah, dekhiye na, uska photo mein to kaisa hai ki ek hai ki bhaiya Amzer 4G Light jaise hai naam. To wo pattern sabka ye same hi rahega. To wo photo aap commonly use kar sakte ho. Saari jo sizes hai jisme Amzer 4G pattern hai.
Executive: Sir, aapko provide karna padega.
Customer: Wo aap nahi le sakte kya? Amzer 4G Light wala photo aap common photo use kar lo na.
Executive: Nahi sir, aise nahi use kar sakti na. Aap jo mujhe photo provide karoge main wahi photo dal sakti hu keval.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur dusra kuch buyleads mein bhi kuch issue wagera the kya?
Customer: Haan, buyleads mein actually wo truck ka jo tyre hai na...
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo actually apne ko available nahi karna hai usme. Matlab deactivate kar lo aap abhi.
Executive: Sir, truck tyre wale to humne us din remove kar diye the. Aap ek kaam aur karo sir, ek baar IndiaMART open karo.
Customer: Abhi to main bhi ghar pe hu and office pahucha nahi hu. Lekin usme dikkat ye aa rahi hai aur ki retail leads zyada aa rahi hai. Ek tyre, do tyre, char tyre ki apne ko aise nahi karna hai.
Executive: Sir, aap logo ko abhi IndiaMART pe sir time bhi zyada nahi hua hai. Abhi October mein hi end mein aapne apna IndiaMART aapka matlab hosting to sir aapki November mein hui hai, do teen November ke aas paas aapki hosting hui hai. Thoda sa sir patience to rakhna padega. Ek dum se teen din mein to sir business nahi mil jayega ya teen din mein.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, actual mein Chandan ji se Chandan ji se us time pe baat hui thi. Unhone bola tha ki aapko agar matlab jitne sizes rakhna hai minimum tyre ka to utne sizes aap andar kar sakte ho ki bhaiya koi bhi order dalega to minimum itne size ka hi dalega. Ki bhaiya 10 tyre ya 20 tyre, 50 tyre jitna bhi aapko set karna hai utna aap figure set kar paoge. To main wahi bol raha hu ki abhi jo hai na wo aap utna figure set kar lo ki bhaiya minimum 50 tyre ya utne tyre ka set kar lo aap abhi.
Executive: Ye main kaise set karungi? Matlab aap...
Customer: Chandan ji aise bol rahe the. Humko bhi nahi malum nahi hai humko aapka matlab system kaise chalta hai.
Executive: Nahi, ye 50 tyre ka ye aap matlab exactly kya minimum order quantity kehna chah rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Minimum order quantity kehna chah rahe ho? To aap hum ye kar sakte hain sir ki har product mein main aapki minimum order quantity jo hai na wo main har ek product mein aapka 50 kar deti hu. Theek hai? Aap 50 se neeche nahi deal karte ho aap ye kehna chah rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan ji, haan, retail leads bahut zyada aati hai aur retail leads to phir aap bhi count kar lete ho. Per day ka jo bonus lead aata hai na, 30 leads aap dete ho humko per day ka hisab se mahine ke 30 leads. To wo phir usme count ho jata hai ki bhaiya humne to aapko diya tha ek bonus lead. Lekin wo hota hai retail lead aur retail lead hota hai kahi kahi out of state ka wo hum contact nahi kar paate hain matlab zyada.
Executive: Lekin for the mean while sir, main aapko ye bol dungi aap daily basis pe sir thoda active ho. Abhi bhi IndiaMART pe aap logo ne buyleads wagera kuch consume nahi kari hai. To pehle sir thodi si buyleads wagera consume kariye, thoda inquiries pe kaam kariye. Ek dum se sir aisa nahi ho sakta hai na ki aap abhi do din pehle IndiaMART pe aaye ho sir aur teesre din saari cheeze ek dum perfect ho jaye. Pehle sir hume visibility pe kaam karna padega, aapki saari visibility maintain karni padegi. Ye saari cheeze hum karenge sir tabhi to thoda sa sir jab AI wagera active hoga tabhi proper leads wagera sir aana shuru hongi. Abhi aap jo keh rahe ho retail lead aa rahi hai uske liye maine aapko filters wagera guide kar rakhe the. Aap filters use kariye, sare filter kar kar ke aap buyleads dekhiye. Jo bhi aapko bulk lead dikh rahi hai aap koi bhi lead consume kar sakte ho.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am, try karte hai ek baar.
Executive: Ek baar ye saari cheeze karo sir and ek baar na sir aapke paas mera personal number hai na sir?
Customer: Haan, aapka hai to sahi.
Executive: To aap sir mujhe us number pe call kiya kariye. Maine isiliye aapko wo wala number provide kiya tha kyunki aap customer care pe bhi sir call karte ho to wo call mere hi paas aayega. Kal bhi aap log jo mujhe call kar rahe the na customer care pe wo call baar baar mere paas hi transfer ho raha tha kyunki aapke account manager main hi hu to sare calls jis bhi yaha pe bhi aap call karoge na IndiaMART pe wo call mere hi paas aayega. Isiliye maine aapko apna personal number provide kiya.
Customer: Haan, wo phir aapko bhi wo lead phir batani padti hai ki maine close ki ya nahi ki wo.
Executive: Wo mujhe bhi ticket aapko phir close karna padega. To isiliye main keh rahi hu ki aap mujhe call kiya karo, mere personal number pe directly call kiya karo. Aap customer care pe kyun call karte ho? Aapko maine isiliye apna number provide kiya hua hai.
Customer: Nahi, actually mujhe bhi pata nahi tha wo Harshad bhai kar rahe hain. Main to nahi kar raha tha usme. Mere paas to tha aapka number to main to us pe hi baat kar raha tha aapke saath.
Executive: Nahi, wahi ek baar aap Harshad sir ko bhi please keh dena ye cheez. To thoda sa wo dekh lenge aur main aapka ye concern abhi close kar du sir?
Customer: Kar do ma'am, ek baar Harshad bhai se baat kar lena lekin phir baad mein hai na?
Executive: Haan, haan, dekho unse to main baat karti hu. Unko kal bhi maine unko bahut baar samjhaya. Wo thoda sa patiently kaam kare na, matlab patience nahi rakh rahe hain.
Customer: Haan, wo thode aise hi hai kyunki unko na matlab thoda properly kaam chahiye matlab ki pura pura aap upload karo. Maine us time pe bhi product upload upload ho raha tha na us time pe bhi maine bhi unko aise hi bataya tha ki apne ko ek pattern ka matlab just upar hi rakhna hai ki bhaiya ye active zip hai to active zip hi rakhna hai. Uske andar pure matlab sizes nahi dalne hain. Maine unko samjhaya tha. Ki apna to kaam theek hai chalo humne to pay kiya hai hum bata denge unko lekin unka kaam bhi zyada badh jayega. Maine unko samjhaya tha aisa nahi hai. Main bhi samajh sakta hu. Maine bhi job ki hai past mein. Mujhe bhi pata hai ki kitna phir workload ho jata hai.
Executive: Exactly, thoda patience sir rakhe. Aisa nahi hai ki business nahi mil raha ye nahi mil raha. Abhi do teen din hi hue hain sir. At least ek mahina, do mahina aap invest to karo, time to invest karo. Aap ek do din mein hi judgement nahi de sakte na hum log.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: At least ek do mahina aap dekho to service wagera kaise use hoga, kaise kaam hoga wo saari cheeze to ek baar dekhni padengi na. Aur baki main ek bari phir se din mein aap log batana jabhi bhi aap free hoge ek baar video meeting pe phir connect ho jayenge. Phir ek baar saari cheeze dekh lenge catalog pe.
Customer: Wo samajh nahi rahe hain. Kai cheeze meri bhi unki cross hoti hai kai baar ki bhaiya waise nahi hota hai lekin wo samajh nahi rahe hain kai baar.
Customer: Haan beta.
Executive: Ek baar aap baat karoge nahi hota to ek baar main apne sir apne manager se baat karwa dungi, koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Chal, chal unse koi din connect kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai? For the mean while sir main ye ticket close kar du?
Customer: Kar do, kar do, koi nahi.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you so much. Bye, haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with executive Harshad.

- Wants to deactivate truck tires from buyleads.

- Receiving retail leads instead of bulk.

- Wants to set minimum order quantity for tires.



Resolution:

- Executive will talk to Harshad about patience.

- Executive offered to set minimum order quantity.

- Executive suggested using filters for bulk leads.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.

- Ticket will be closed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, retail leads, minimum order quantity, catalog, filters
